channel.title: Improvements on The Big Ugly House Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Improvements on The Big Ugly House Blog

item.title: Dishwashers are overrated
item.description: Washing a dish takes 10 seconds. Putting a dish in the dishwasher takes 7 seconds. 3 seconds is nothing. You can keep standing straight up to wash dishes in the sink.Â You have to bend over to put something in the dishwasher. Dishes in the dish drying rack are always clean, so you can get into a habit of putting a dish or two away whenever you are waiting for something on the stove.
